description: This signifies change in the destination of the CDRs
(Charging Data Record)

Summary.eval: ($v1==1) ? 'CDRs redirected to active CGF' : (($v1==2) ? 'Active CGF is down. CDRs written to backup local storage device' : 'Active CGF is down. Backup local storage device not configured')

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgCDRDestNotif JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgCDRDest i 1 JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgTSPName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgActiveCgfIpAddr a 192.0.2.1

description: This indicates any transisitions in the state of the CGF.
Value 1 indicates one of the CGF for the Group came up. Redirecting CDRs to the Active CGF.
Value 2 indicates last active CGF for the Group went down. CDRs being written to backup Local storage device.
Value 3 indicates last active CGF for the Group went down. Backup Local storage device not configured.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgCDRDest

description: A string that uniquely identifies the Transport Profile.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgTSPName

description: CGF Server IP-address.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgActiveCgfIpAddr

description: This signifies the internal memory unavalability in the system.

Summary.eval: ($v2==1) ? 'Internal memory usage reached level 1 critical threshold' : (($v2==3) ? 'Internal memory usage reached level 2 critical threshold' : 'Internal memory usage normal')

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgMemThresNotif JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus i 1 JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgMemLimit i 1 JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgTSPName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgServicePicName s EXAMPLE

description: Value 1 indicates that the Alarm for a particular condition is present.
Value 2 indicates that the Alarm for a particular condition is absent.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus

description: This indicates any transisitions in the state of the CGF.
Value 1 indicates System has reached Level 1 critical memory threshold.
Action - Check the CGF server connections. If local storage is enabled
please ftp the charging records immediately.
If local storage is not enabled, please enable it so the
charging records can be stored in local persistent storage.
Risk - No new sessions will be allowed.
Value 2 indicates System reaching Level 1 critical memory threshold
condition has been resolved.
Value 3 indicates System has reached Level 2 critical memory threshold.
Action - Check the CGF server connections. If local storage is enabled
please ftp the charging records immediately.
If local storage is not enabled, please enable it so the
charging records can be stored in local persistent storage.
Risk - New and existing sessions will be not be allowed.
Value 4 indicates System reaching Level 2 critical memory threshold
condition has been resolved.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgMemLimit

description: A string that uniquely identifies the Transport Profile.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgTSPName

where <a> is the slot and <b> could be either 0 or 1.

description: This signifies the memory unavailability in the local storage in
the system.

event.Summary: Local storage memory utilization $v2% reached water mark $v1

This alarm is sent outwhen the utilization exceeds or falls below configured high threshold value. Thealarm status (Active/Clear)is indicated by the jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus variable.

Summary.eval: ($v4==1) ? 'Internal memory usage reached level 1 critical threshold' : (($v4==3) ? 'Internal memory usage reached Level 2 critical threshold' : 'Internal memory usage is normal')

variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgServicePicName

description: This indicates any transisitions in the state of the CGF.
Value 1 indicates System has reached Level 1 critical memory threshold.
Action - Check the CGF server connections. If local storage is enabled
please ftp the charging records immediately.
If local storage is not enabled, please enable it so the
charging records can be stored in local persistent storage.
Risk - No new sessions will be allowed.
Value 2 indicates System reaching Level 1 critical memory threshold
condition has been resolved.
Value 3 indicates System has reached Level 2 critical memory threshold.
Action - Check the CGF server connections. If local storage is enabled
please ftp the charging records immediately.
If local storage is not enabled, please enable it so the
charging records can be stored in local persistent storage.
Risk - New and existing sessions will be not be allowed.
Value 4 indicates System reaching Level 2 critical memory threshold
condition has been resolved.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgMemLimit

description: Value 1 indicates that the Alarm for a particular condition is present.
Value 2 indicates that the Alarm for a particular condition is absent.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus

description: This trap indicates the alarm status on the node associated with the utilization of inernal memory space for charging records. This alarm is sent outwhen the utilization exceeds or falls below configured medium threshold value. The alarm status (Active/Clear)is indicated by the jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus variable.

Summary.eval: ($v4==1) ? 'Internal memory usage reached level 1 critical threshold' : (($v4==3) ? 'Internal memory usage reached level 2 critical threshold' : 'Internal memory usage is normal')

variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus

description: This trap indicates the alarm status on the node associated with the utilization of local storage space for charging records. This alarm is sent out when the utilization exceeds or falls below configured high threshold of available disk space. The alarm status (Active/Clear)is indicated by the jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus variable.

Summary.eval: ($v1==1) ? 'Charging records local storage utilization $v3% exceeded high threshold' : 'Charging records local storage utilization $v3% is normal'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgLcsThresHighNotify JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAYS::jnxMbgGwName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus i 1 JUNIPER-MOBILITY-CHARGING-MIB::jnxMbgPgwCgLcsUtil u 9999

This alarm is sent out when the utilization exceeds or falls below configured medium threshold of available disk space. The alarm status (Active/Clear)is indicated by the jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus variable.

Summary.eval: ($v1==1) ? 'Charging records local storage utilization $v3% exceeded normal threshold' : 'Charging records local storage utilization $v3% normal'
